about_the_game:
"Blood Rose ~ Origin of the Plague ~" is a short adult 2D shoting rpg developed by nikukyu and published by 072 Project.

With Agent Rosetta, explore the mansion and uncover the cause of the large-scale outbreak of the biochemical virus!

After x days of a bio-virus pandemic,

although the situation is gradually calming down, no one knows where the virus originated from.

One day, the British intelligence agency discovers that a doctor living in a country

in the easternmost likely the mastermind behind it all.

With very few personnel available to act in this ongoing crisis,

the only one selected is a member of the team with the most agile and cautious skills,

"Rosetta Aldridge". Rosetta, along with her support partner "Oluton Zakariya",

head to the doctor's mansion alone.

Rosetta was instructed by the Intelligence Bureau to go to the Far East, to the residence of a doctor.

Investigate the truth about the large-scale outbreak of a biochemical virus. However, she discovered a mysterious underground basement in the mansion, along with a horde of zombies!!

Defeat the zombies while searching for clues to advance the plot! Don't leave any walls unchecked!

And don't forget to use the radio to exchange information with your partner "Oluton" at any time; he might provide some useful Information."

  • 2D gun battle action RPG game

  • Escape Puzzle

  • Clothing damage

  • Can be cleared as a virgin

  • Can skip dialogue

  • Supports full-screen mode

  • Keys can be changed/Gamepad can be used

  • Memory Mode

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains  non-consensual sex,  sexual acts,   genital nudity scenes, Interspecies Sex (sex with zombie),  violence, beastiality etc. It is not suitable for all ages. All characters in this work are over 20 years old.

detailed_description:
💕ONANIましょう👉👌


About the Game

"Blood Rose ~ Origin of the Plague ~" is a short adult 2D shoting rpg developed by nikukyu and published by 072 Project.

With Agent Rosetta, explore the mansion and uncover the cause of the large-scale outbreak of the biochemical virus!

After x days of a bio-virus pandemic,

although the situation is gradually calming down, no one knows where the virus originated from.

One day, the British intelligence agency discovers that a doctor living in a country

in the easternmost likely the mastermind behind it all.

With very few personnel available to act in this ongoing crisis,

the only one selected is a member of the team with the most agile and cautious skills,

"Rosetta Aldridge". Rosetta, along with her support partner "Oluton Zakariya",

head to the doctor's mansion alone.

Rosetta was instructed by the Intelligence Bureau to go to the Far East, to the residence of a doctor.

Investigate the truth about the large-scale outbreak of a biochemical virus. However, she discovered a mysterious underground basement in the mansion, along with a horde of zombies!!

Defeat the zombies while searching for clues to advance the plot! Don't leave any walls unchecked!

And don't forget to use the radio to exchange information with your partner "Oluton" at any time; he might provide some useful Information."

  • 2D gun battle action RPG game

  • Escape Puzzle

  • Clothing damage

  • Can be cleared as a virgin

  • Can skip dialogue

  • Supports full-screen mode

  • Keys can be changed/Gamepad can be used

  • Memory Mode
name: Blood Rose ~ Origin of the Plague

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: After a massive outbreak of a bio-virus, the intelligence agency sent a skilled female agent, "Rosetta," to the easternmost country to investigate the true cause of this catastrophe. Can Rosetta uncover the truth within the mansion haunted by monsters and make her out alive?
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
